entries.journal_entry_description: The Alliance needs raw materials for completing the military base on Rori. They have asked you to supply them with 500 units of obsidian ore from the Kessel system.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: The Alliance has tasked you with mining 500 units of obsidian ore in the Kessel system.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You have completed the mission in the Kessel system. You should return to Lieutenant Romer in Restuss and give him the ore.
